evidence.text: 22 | 2021-07-23 | STATUS CONFERENCE held before District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith: Jody Stewart, OCR. Claire Wuerker and Kyle Smiddie present on behalf of plaintiff. Jeff Rosen present on behalf of defendant, along with representatives from Hampton Roads Regional Jail Authority. James C. Welch, Monitor, present. Status Conference held on 7/23/2021. Comments of court, counsel and the Monitor heard re the Status Report. Court adjourned. (sche) (Entered: 07/23/2021)

evidence.text: 77 | 2024-07-31 | ORDER- Upon consideration of the Joint Motion to Dismiss 75, it is hereby ORDERED that this action is dismissed with prejudice. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 7/31/2024. (Vpea) (Entered: 07/31/2024)
